text_block_list.text:
I came for the year's first shrine visit 
with Gold Ship, but…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Damnation……!! Why must it…!! 
Damn it, damn it……!!

― Since arriving at the shrine, Gold
Ship has been angry about something!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
What happened in a measly year……!? 
Why did things turn out like this!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Can't you tell!!? 
I'm talking about yakisoba!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Oh, mercy! This time every year,
countless stalls are lined up…! And
among all them, there was a yakisoba
stall!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
And yet…… this year, 
I can't find it anywhere!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Why for? Are you telling me the yakisoba 
did something wrong?! Did they…?!

… I have no clue what's up with 
the stall. Though I think they 
sometimes just don't have one.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Damn…… damn it……!! 
Treating yakisoba so carelessly!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
If that's how it is, I have some ideas
too…!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I've made up my mind! This year, I'll
give my all to become the horsegirl
leading the yakisoba world to new
heights!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I will re-introduce the public to the 
wonders of yakisoba, educate 
and enlighten them—

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna push yakisoba back to the 
world's number one junk food spot!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You're gonna help me, of course!? 
With that said, where do you think 
we should start?

I don't know what answer she's expecting 
but for the moment…
choice_data_list: Have some to put the taste fresh in our minds.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: The taste, in our minds?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
That's true, I need to be the one who 
best understands yakisoba…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
If not, I won't be able to convince 
others of its wonders…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
So, I will understand you, yakisoba!! 
I'll give you my love… deeper, and 
more intensely than anyone!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Preparing… it…?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I see, what's lacking is 
charismatic techniques…!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
If I could cook up yakisoba out of 
thin air with my divine technique… 
That would be hit news for sure…!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
A'ight! I'm gonna take the yakisoba
world by storm with my illusionist
skills!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Did you just say… novel combinations!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You're absolutely right.…… Stereotypical 
yakisoba ain't gonna change the world…!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Fortunately, we have freedom of
expression. To use sweets, to get rid of
the noodles entirely… I can do whatever
I want!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Let's do it, dive into the endless
ocean! I'll bring the colours of the
rainbow to yakisoba!!
